description.narrative: It is envisaged that at least 38 producers organizations will access long term loans through MFIs through TMF Microfinance for value addition purposes. The 7 MFIs targeted Duterimbere, Wisigara, Umutanguha, Inkunge, CAF Isonga and Unicecam Ejoheza

The main aim is to create a conducive investment environment to produce organization and to strengthen the link between MFIs and cooperative in the value chained of mainly maize, beans, Irish Potato and vegetables . it is envisaged that at least 38 producer organizations will access long term loans through MFIs through TMF Microfinance, for value addition purposes. The 7 MFIs Outcome Cooperatives and agribusinesses start up and existing are better able to access loans from microfinance institutions. Microfinance institutions are better able to assess the financial needs of POs and to provide appropriate PO specific financial products and service to agriculture value chain cooperative agribusinesses in sustainable manners.

mailing-address.narrative: ICCO, Terrafina Microfinance Joseph Haydnlaan 2 a 3533 AE UTRECHT
